getFile() - Static method in class it.univpm.esameOOP.utility.GetFileFromJSON
This method calls GetJSONFromURL.getJSON() and saves the shared links inside an ArrayList (the json has name="link" and value=JSONArray)
getFile(Path) - Static method in class it.univpm.esameOOP.utility.GetFileFromJSON
This method calls the GetJSONFromURL.getJSON(java.nio.file.Path) and saves the files inside the folder into an ArrayList (the json has name="entries" and value=JSONArray)

getJSON() - Static method in class it.univpm.esameOOP.utility.GetJSONFromURL
This method gets the JSONObject from the shared_links api, getting all the shared files in the specified Dropbox account
getJSON(Path) - Static method in class it.univpm.esameOOP.utility.GetJSONFromURL
This method gets the JSONObject from the list_folder api called on the specified path, which gives all the files inside the folder
GetJSONFromURL - Class in it.univpm.esameOOP.utility
This class opens a connection with the chosen api, reading and copying the response json in a String which gets parsed in the form of a JSONObject
